_description: Additional resolutions for ICE and WiX validation rules

resolutions.resolution: Fix bundle configuration. Review Bundle authoring for errors.
Fix package configuration. Ensure package attributes are valid.
Fix chain error. Review Chain structure and package ordering.
Fix variable configuration. Review variable declarations and usage.
Fix payload error. Check payload SourceFile and other attributes.
Fix burn engine configuration. Review burn engine options.
Fix package group configuration. Check PackageGroup references.
Fix related bundle configuration. Check related bundle detection.
Fix update bundle configuration. Check update feed URL and settings.
Fix bundle extension configuration. Check extension references.
Fix WiX source syntax. Review XML for correct element structure.
Fix element attribute. Check attribute values and types.
Fix child element placement. Ensure elements are nested correctly.
Fix element reference. Referenced element must exist.
Fix duplicate identifier. Each Id must be unique within scope.
Fix missing required attribute. Add the required attribute value.
Fix invalid attribute value. Use a value from allowed set.
Fix preprocessor directive. Check ifdef/ifndef syntax.
Fix include file. Ensure included file exists and path is correct.
Fix preprocessor variable. Define variable before use.
Fix extension reference. Ensure extension is installed.
Fix deprecated element. Use the recommended replacement.
Fix element namespace. Use correct xmlns for element.
Fix component GUID. Provide valid GUID or use Guid='*'.
Fix directory reference. Directory must be defined.
Fix feature reference. Feature must be defined.
Fix property reference. Property must be defined.
Fix custom action reference. Custom action must be defined.
Fix candle compilation error. Review error message for details.
Fix source file error. Check file path and content.
Fix schema validation. XML must match WiX schema.
Fix binding variable. Ensure variable will be resolved at link time.
Fix localization reference. Localization string must exist.
Fix preprocessor error. Check preprocessor directive syntax.
Fix conditional expression. Check condition syntax.
Fix extension error. Check extension configuration.
Fix warning configuration. Review warning message.
Fix source encoding. Ensure UTF-8 encoding for WiX files.
Fix COM registration. Check CLSID and ProgId configuration.
Fix COM server path. Ensure InprocServer32 path is correct.
Fix type library registration. Check TypeLib attributes.
Fix interface registration. Check Interface element attributes.
Fix COM+ configuration. Review ComPlusApplication settings.
Fix DARC configuration. Check Directory/Access/Read/Copy settings.
Fix file permissions. Review LockPermissions configuration.
Fix directory permissions. Check directory security settings.
Fix registry permissions. Review registry LockPermissions.
Fix service permissions. Check service security configuration.
Fix dependency configuration. Check Provides/Requires elements.
Fix provides key. Ensure unique provider key.
Fix requires reference. Ensure required key exists.
Fix DirectX configuration. Check DirectX prerequisite.
Fix DirectX runtime. Ensure correct runtime version.
Fix extension configuration. Check extension attributes.
Fix extension reference. Ensure extension is available.
Fix extension namespace. Use correct extension namespace.
Fix extension element. Check element is from correct extension.
Fix firewall rule name. Provide unique rule name.
Fix firewall program. Check executable path.
Fix firewall port. Specify valid port number or range.
Fix firewall scope. Check RemoteAddress configuration.
Fix URL reservation. Check UrlReservation attributes.
Fix HTTP namespace. Ensure correct URL format.
Fix URL ACL. Check security descriptor configuration.
Fix SSL certificate. Check certificate configuration.
Fix component advertising. Shortcut components must have GUID for advertisement.
Fix merge module directory. Check directory references.
Fix merge module feature. Check feature references.
Fix merge module property. Check module configuration.
Fix merge module sequence. Check action sequencing.
Fix merge module cab. Check cabinet configuration.
Fix merge module validation. Review merge module.
Fix website configuration. Check WebSite element attributes.
Fix web application. Check WebApplication configuration.
Fix virtual directory. Check WebVirtualDir attributes.
Fix app pool configuration. Check WebAppPool settings.
Fix web directory. Check WebDir configuration.
Fix MIME map. Check MimeMap configuration.
Fix web service extension. Check WebServiceExtension.
Fix certificate. Check Certificate configuration.
Fix IIS property. Check WebProperty configuration.
Fix linker error. Check file references.
Fix library reference. Ensure .wixlib is available.
Fix object file. Check .wixobj file.
Fix binding error. Check BindPath configuration.
Fix cabinet creation. Check file references.
Fix MSI creation. Check output configuration.
Fix transform creation. Check transform configuration.
Fix patch creation. Check patch baseline.
Fix bundle creation. Check bundle configuration.
Fix symbol resolution. Ensure all references are satisfied.
Fix duplicate symbol. Remove or rename duplicate.
Fix unresolved reference. Add missing fragment.
Fix section conflict. Resolve conflicting sections.
Fix output path. Check output file path.
Fix intermediate file. Check .wixobj processing.
Fix localization. Check .wxl file content.
Fix extension processing. Check extension availability.
Fix signing. Check certificate configuration.
Fix validation. Address ICE validation errors.
Fix light error. Review error message for details.
Fix library error. Check library configuration.
Fix object error. Check intermediate object file.
Fix binding variable. Check variable definition.
Fix file reference. Check SourceFile path.
Fix cabinet error. Check cabinet compression.
Fix validation error. Review validation output.
Fix extension error. Check extension configuration.
Fix output error. Check output file creation.
Fix message queue configuration. Check MessageQueue attributes.
Fix queue permissions. Check MessageQueuePermission.
Fix queue path. Ensure valid queue path format.
Fix .NET Framework reference. Check DotNetCompatibilityCheck.
Fix native image. Check NativeImage configuration.
Fix assembly reference. Check assembly configuration.
Fix .NET Core check. Check DotNetCoreSearch.
Fix assembly GAC. Check assembly GAC installation.
Fix CLR version. Check target CLR version.
Fix runtime check. Check runtime detection.
Fix SDK check. Check SDK detection configuration.
Fix .NET configuration. Review .NET framework setup.
Fix PowerShell configuration. Check PowerShell formatting.
Fix PowerShell module. Check PSModulePath configuration.
Fix PowerShell script. Check script execution policy.
Fix smoke test failure. Review test results.
Fix installation test. Review install simulation.
Fix uninstall test. Review uninstall simulation.
Fix repair test. Review repair simulation.
Fix feature test. Review feature selection.
Fix rollback test. Review rollback behavior.
Fix sequence test. Review action sequencing.
Fix condition test. Review condition evaluation.
Fix property test. Review property handling.
Fix file test. Review file operations.
Fix SQL connection. Check SqlDatabase connection string.
Fix SQL script. Check SqlScript file path.
Fix SQL string. Check SqlString content.
Fix SQL user. Check User configuration.
Fix SQL login. Check SqlLogin configuration.
Fix database creation. Check CreateOnInstall.
Fix database drop. Check DropOnUninstall.
Fix SQL sequence. Check script execution order.
Fix SQL rollback. Check RollbackOnFailure.
Fix software tag. Check Tag element attributes.
Fix tag regid. Provide valid regid value.
Fix utility element. Check Util extension element.
Fix user account. Check User element configuration.
Fix group. Check Group element configuration.
Fix file share. Check FileShare configuration.
Fix performance counter. Check PerformanceCategory.
Fix event source. Check EventSource configuration.
Fix service configuration. Check ServiceConfig.
Fix XML configuration. Check XmlFile/XmlConfig.
Fix internet shortcut. Check InternetShortcut.
Fix validation error. Review specific validation message.
Fix validation warning. Consider addressing warning.
Fix table validation. Check table structure.
Fix column validation. Check column constraints.
Fix foreign key. Ensure referenced row exists.
Fix data type. Use correct data type for column.
Fix string length. Shorten string to fit column.
Fix null value. Provide value for non-nullable column.
Fix duplicate key. Use unique primary key value.
Fix reference integrity. Fix broken references.
Fix localized value. Check localization string.
Fix formatted value. Check format template.
Fix condition syntax. Check condition expression.
Fix GUID format. Use {8-4-4-4-12} format.
Fix version format. Use major.minor.build.revision format.
Fix Visual Studio integration. Check VS extension setup.
Fix VS extension. Check VS extension configuration.
Fix VS dependency. Check VS prerequisite detection.
Fix WiX error. Review specific error message.
Fix WiX warning. Consider addressing warning.
Fix deprecation warning. Use recommended replacement.
Fix obsolete usage. Update to current syntax.
Fix configuration. Check project configuration.
Fix extension usage. Check extension configuration.
Fix SDK reference. Check SDK configuration.
Fix build configuration. Review build settings.
Fix extension error. Check extension availability.
Fix binding error. Check binding configuration.
Fix localization error. Check WXL files.
Fix output error. Check output configuration.
Fix validation error. Address ICE errors.
Fix signing error. Check signing configuration.
Fix compression error. Check cabinet settings.
Fix build error. Review build output.
